channel.description: Recent content in guidelines on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: How we crafted the OGIF summarizer bot to streamline weekly knowledge-sharing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What’s OGIF? OGIF stands for “Oh God It’s Friday.” It’s our weekly Friday tradition where members share 10-minute talks. The team hops on Discord to share and discuss diverse topics like software development, engineering patterns, industry trends, finance, entrepreneurship, blockchain, AI, and a mix of other cool stuff.

item.title: Recapping A publication
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Recapping a publication is the work of summarizing its key points, analyzing why it matters, and providing insights or opinions on its content.

item.title: Life cycle of a publication
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Following the core theme of MMA (Mastery, Meaning, Autonomy), every piece of content we put out requires a strategic approach, so it can cut through the noise, serve purposes and meanings to readers.
